title: Banking banner is missing for specific Collect Information case.
description: Expected Results: Banking banner is missing on Agreements Page.  As the bank is in “Collect Info” status.
discussion: Steps To Reproduce: 1. Create an Apps provider 2. Create a bank with triggers the PII. (i.e add  “-pending” to the account holder name) 3. Notice the PII Window pops up. 4. Now, Cancel the PopUp window.  5. Notice the Banking Status = “Collect Information”. -  Correct 6. Notice the Agreement page is missing the banner.  -   Incorrect!
